subSections.title: Readings
Compounds
Derived terms
subSections.text: * {{ja-r|井 の 中 の 蛙 大海 を 知らず|い の なか の かわず たいかい を しらず}}: metaphor of a narrow world view based on limited experience (literally, "a frog in a well does not know the great ocean")
